廢.definition: to abolish; to abandon; to abrogate; to discard; to depose; to oust; crippled; abandoned; waste

廢品.definition: production rejects; seconds; scrap; discarded material

廢土.definition: waste soil (excavation waste, contaminated soil etc); (post-apocalyptic) wasteland

廢寢忘食.definition: (idiom) to skip one's sleep and meals; to be completely wrapped up in one's work

廢寢忘餐.definition: see 廢寢忘食|废寝忘食[fei4qin3-wang4shi2]

廢弛.definition: to fall into disuse (of laws, customs etc); to neglect

廢棄.definition: to discard; to abandon (old ways); to invalidate

廢止.definition: to repeal (a law); to put an end to; abolition; annulled

廢統.definition: "abandonment of reunification", abolition of the cross-straits reunification committee

廢置.definition: to discard; to shelve as useless

廢藩置縣.definition: to abolish the feudal Han and introduce modern prefectures (refers to reorganization during Meiji Japan)

廢話.definition: nonsense; rubbish; superfluous words; You don't say!; No kidding! (gently sarcastic)

廢話連篇.definition: a bunch of nonsense; verbose and rambling

廢銅爛鐵.definition: scrap metal; a pile of junk

廢除.definition: to abolish; to abrogate; to repeal
